title: World Rugby Men's 15s Player of the Year
summary: The World Rugby Men's 15s Player of the Year is an accolade awarded annually by World Rugby at the World Rugby Awards.[1]  The award is presented to honour "the achievements of those involved at the highest level of the world game on the field".[1]  The first World Rugby Player of the Year award was presented in 2001.[2] It was called the IRB International Player of the Year; from 2007 until 2014 it was the IRB Player of the Year; in 2014 the award was titled the World Rugby Player of the Year before adopting its current name in 2016.[2]
